description: The move agreed by the Irish cabinet on Tuesday will likely put pressure on Stormont to follow suit.
title: Covid-19: Irish drink-only pubs to reopen from 21 September
title_page: Covid-19: Irish drink-only pubs to reopen from 21 September - BBC News
maintext: Last week, it was announced that pubs in the Republic of Ireland must keep records of the meals every customer orders for 28 days so they can be inspected by Garda¨ª (police) or health officials.
